io.odysz.semantics

Interface ISemantext


  • public interface ISemantext

    Interface for semantic event handler.

    A semantic event can be for example starting an insert transaction with a data row. Such data may needing some processing defined by the application requirements.

    For example, a "fullpath" field in table means a deep first traveling order of tree nodes.

    In this case, a user defined semantic event handler can compose this data (fullpath) according to it's parent's fullpath, then append the field into the inserting row.

    Semantic-transact is designed only process SQL structure, not handling the data semantics, so it only fire the event to the handler, the implementation of ISemantext.

    An ISemantext instance is used as an sql composing context by semantic-transact when travel the AST and composing SQL(s). There must be an insert(io.odysz.transact.sql.Insert, java.lang.String, io.odysz.semantics.IUser...) event which fired at the beginning of composing an insert sql, and 1 or more times for inserting row event, the onInsert(io.odysz.transact.sql.Insert, java.lang.String, java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object[]>>).

    Author:
    ody

      String genId(String tabl, String col)
      Generate an auto increasing ID for tabl.col, where connection is initialized when constructing this implementation.
      The new generated value is managed in this implementation class (for future resolving).
      side effect: generated auto key already been put into autoVals, can be referenced later.
      ISemantext insert(Insert insert, String mainTabl, IUser... usr)
      Called when starting a insert transaction's sql composing.
      Create a context for the insert-sql composing process.
      Parameter usr is optional if the semantics handler don't care about user's fingerprint.

      • onInsert

        ISemantext onInsert(Insert insert,
                    String tabl,
                    List<ArrayList<Object[]>> rows)
             throws TransException
        Called each time an <@link Insert} statement found itself will composing a insert-sql (Insert.sql(ISemantext))
        Resolving inserting values, e.g an AUTO key is generated here.
        Parameters:
        insert -
        tabl -
        rows - [ list[Object[n, v], ... ], ... ]
        Returns:
        the ISemantext context, a thread safe context for resolving semantics like FK value resolving.
        Throws:
        SemanticException
        TransException

        Object resulvedVal(String table,

        col -
        Returns:
        RESULt resoLVED VALue in tabl.col

      • genId

        String genId(String tabl,
             String col)
      throws SQLException,
             TransException
        Generate an auto increasing ID for tabl.col, where connection is initialized when constructing this implementation.
        The new generated value is managed in this implementation class (for future resolving).
        side effect: generated auto key already been put into autoVals, can be referenced later.
        Parameters:
        tabl -
        col -
        Returns:
        new auto key.
        Throws:
        SQLException
        TransException
